Feel the heat of summer.', icon: , bgColor: 'from-blue-100 to-blue-200', textColor: 'text-blue-400' }, { title: 'The Baselayers', description: 'Defining pieces for under every thing.', icon: , bgColor: 'from-gray-100 to-gray-200', textColor: 'text-gray-400' }, { title: 'New Arrivals', description: 'The just-in styles for the new season. Explore the new classics.', icon: , bgColor: 'from-green-100 to-green-200', textColor: 'text-green-400' } ]; const handleEmailSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (email) { alert('Cảm ơn bạn đã đăng ký nhận tin!'); setEmail(''); } }; return (
